sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NO, TITLE, LOCAL, CONTENTS, HIT, REGDATE) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, #title#, #local#, #contents#, 0, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT NO, TITLE, LOCAL, CONTENTS, HIT, REGDATE, FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY NO DESC)-1)/10 + 1) PAGE FROM NOTICE ) WHERE PAGE = #page#
SELECT NO, TITLE, LOCAL, CONTENTS, HIT, REGDATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NO = #no#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET HIT = (SELECT HIT FROM NOTICE WHERE NO = #no#) + 1 WHERE NO = #no#
